column4: hello.... i was doing an scp transfer of a folder with a BUNCH of data in it (~150GB) and the connection cut midway... is there any way I can resume the transfer without restarting everything? something like a `cp -u` parameter?
not that i know using only scp (but with little scrip yes), try use rsync instead
does rsync use ssh to tunnel the data through?
rsync -avz -e ssh remoteuser@remotehost:/remote/dir /this/dir/   google gives me that line
